attributes.action: Reinstate the voting rights of British citizens living overseas
attributes.additional_details: It is their duty to get rid of this totally unfair situation which is not upheld by other nations
attributes.background: Bring this to the floor of the house. British citizens who have lived overseas for more than 15 years are not entitled to vote, even though they may be UK tax payers. Allow no filibustering. This has been promised by the last 3 Tory leaders

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Remove the 15 year rule on British expats voting in UK General Elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559243

Enable UK expats to have votes for life
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561581
